Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory91.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "We can't win! These are bionic machines built purely for war! We're just some spec ops Constructs!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'Shut your trap and just fight!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'ROAR!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher A', 3: "It's just like that one time... It's just like 'em tales... These bios are gunna wreck the ARU..."}
{2: 'Fisher B', 3: "Where's dem Forest Guards at, aye?! Must be the work of 'em hybrids!"}
{2: 'Fisher C', 3: "Damn you bobbing pieces of bionic trash! We MADE you! We're your master!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Angry Bear', 3: "GO AT THEM! DON'T MIND THE LOSSES!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The ARU defenses and the bionic machines clash. Fear slowly creeps into the hearts of people.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'This... This is just...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Martin and the other bionic machines arrive to see hell painted before their visual modules.'}
{2: 'Martin', 3: 'Nanami, we need to do something about this!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "...Something's not right.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami has been silent ever since she arrived. She quickly scans the battlefield, confirming her suspicions.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'ROAR!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher A', 3: 'Guess this do be the end of the line for me...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A bionic bear slams a fisherman onto the ground, but it does not follow up with an attack. Its claw remains hinged mid-air, hesitant at dealing the fatal blow. Yetâ€”'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine (?)', 3: 'ROAURGH!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another bear model ignores the hesitant bear and barges in, stomping and crushing the fisherman.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even the hesitant bear finds the gruesome ending unbearable, but there is no point to reproaching its companion. Brandishing its claws once more, it charges at the next target.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher B', 3: 'Damn you all!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '...That one was a Corrupted, Martin.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Similar scenarios occur everywhere in the battlefield. Hearing Nanami, the other bionics enter into disarray.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "That means some of us have been corrupted... If that's the case, then will the others...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "No. It likely won't spread further. I think I know what the Corrupted are here for.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'So what are they here for...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'They are here to instigate hatred... Someone is controlling the Corrupted to do so, while they sit somewhere safe to watch.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is getting REAL ANGRY!', 4: '1'}
